Tells whether we the CollabEditingService is connected to the Collaborative Editing Framework's server.

Returns:

connectToServiceAndServer

public void connectToServiceAndServer(WMPConnectionListener listener)
This method handles all necessary steps to connect to the MXA service and the Collaborative Editing Service. The calling class should implement the WMPConnectionListener interface and pass itself as a parameter to get notified when the connection is up and running and when it is teared down again. Additionally one may use the isCollabEditingServiceConnected() method in combination with the ICollabEditingService object's connection methods to get this information.

Parameters:
listener - Implementation of the WMPConnectionListener interface, which is notified about connection state changes.

registerViewUpdater

public void registerViewUpdater(ViewUpdater v)
Registers the given ViewUpdater, so that it gets notified on the arrival of new AwarenessEvents.

Parameters:
v - ViewUpdater to be eventually notified about AwarenessEvents

disconnectFromMXA

public void disconnectFromMXA()

deregisterViewUpdater

public void deregisterViewUpdater(ViewUpdater v)
De-registers the given ViewUpdater, so that it gets notified on the arrival of new AwarenessEvents.

Parameters:
v - ViewUpdater which should not be notified about AwarenessEvents any more

deregisterCollabEditingCallback

public void deregisterCollabEditingCallback()
This method disconnects the app from the MXA's CollabEditingService. You should call this after disconnection from a Collaborative Editing Session if it is obvious, that the service isn't needed any more in the near future as this will save some resources.

isConnectedToMXA

public boolean isConnectedToMXA()
